brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must match the header, address, protocol, or term to the proper layer in the network model.

Layers
Layers 5 to 7 - Application
Layer 4 Transport
Layer 3 Network
Layer 2 Data Link
Layer 1 Physical

Terms
Dotted Decimal IP address
Binary zeros and ones
Ethernet
TCP port number
UDP
POP3
FTP
DSL
SMTP
Telnet
SNMP
DNS
